titleStmt.title: A fig for Momus containing pleasant varietie, included in satyres, eclogues, and epistles, by T.L. of Lincolnes Inne Gent.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [T. Orwin] for Clement Knight, and are to bee solde at his shop at the little north-doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
